# `ResetPasswordEvents`

```ts
type ResetPasswordEvents =
  | { type: 'REQUEST'; email: string; options: ResetPasswordOptions }
  | { type: 'SUCCESS' }
  | { type: 'ERROR'; error: ErrorPayload | null }
```
